author: Emma Munbodh
title: Aldi's Jo Malone inspired candles listed for ELEVEN times the purchase price on eBay - and new stock IS coming
text:
Wax lyrical: Shoppers are going mad for the Mother's Day special - so much so they're willing to pay A LOT more Share Get money   Thank you for subscribing!   
A collection of Aldi Mother's Day candles are being flogged for up to ELEVEN times the retail price on eBay, after being compared to luxury bath and body brand Jo Malone, and selling out in just minutes. 
The 'specialbuy' candles, which come it at just £3.99, include three rich scents: Pomegranate Noir, Freesia and Pear or Lime Basil and Mandarin. 
Each arrives encased in a contemporary glass jar design - complete with a silver finish, replicating the £44 premium versions available to buy at John Lewis and House of Fraser. 
The budget supermarket boasts each jar also includes a burn time of 48 hours - compared to just 45 hours as advertised on the official Jo Malone website, fuelling even more demand. 
On Wednesday, when the item hit UK stores, budding buyers took to twitter to express their disappointment after it sold out in record time. 
One buyer woke up 40 minutes early to buy the fragrance - but said it has already sold out at 8am. 
Just hours later, the candles started to make an appearance on eBay - with one member is listing the pomegranate version for £45 – more than 11 times the retail price, although it's not yet sold. 
The highest paid price paid, so far, for one candle is £14.99 with free postage. The candle has sold for £10 above the retail price - but is still a lot cheaper than the Jo Malone version Where can I get one? 
If you're after one of Aldi's designer scents, but don't want to fork out over the odds, all is not lost. 
The store has now announced that due to demand, the fragrances will be available to buy online from Tuesday 21 March - just in time for Mothering Sunday. 
Aldi's joint managing director of corporate buying Tony Baines said: "We believe that everyone should be able to afford the very best for their mums, without the luxury price tag.” 
"In light of the overwhelming demand we have experienced, we are pleased to confirm that our Luxury Candle range will be available to purchase online at aldi.co.uk from Tuesday 21 March. Jo Malone's iconic range sells for £44 and above on the high street 
"The range has been one of our most successful specialbuys and we’re delighted to ensure as many of our customers as possible can enjoy the stunning range that equal the quality, strength and performance of high-end alternatives, at an everyday low price." 
He added that to ensure all customers benefit from the product, the candles will be limited to two per transaction. Like us on Facebook
